sentences.sentence: Lack of sleep can make you more likely to behave unethically.
sentences.translation: 缺乏睡眠的时候更容易做出毁三观的事情。

sentences.sentence: At the start of the study, 39 of the participants were asked to write, for 15 minutes, about a time when they had behaved unethically.
sentences.translation: 研究开始的时候，39名参与者被要求在15分钟内写下他们不道德的经历。

sentences.sentence: If they see you dealing unethically with vendors, lying to stakeholders, cheating clients, or failing to keep your word, the best and most principled of them will leave.
sentences.translation: 如果他们看到你和供应商做生意不道德，对股东撒谎，欺骗消费者，或者不遵守诺言，好员工和有原则的人会离开。
